metadata.title: As Long As There's Christmas (Reprise)
metadata.origin: Lyrics from Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas
metadata.author: Written by Rachel Portman and Don Black
metadata.perform: Performed by Paige O'Hara as Belle and Bernadette Peters as Angelique

lg.ln: Angelique: When I felt lost and lonely
Not a dream in my head
Angelique: As long as there's Christmas I truly believe
Angelique & Belle: That hope is the greatest of the gifts we'll receive
As long as our guiding star shines above
Angelique: There will always be Christmas
Belle: So there always will be a time
When the world is filled with peace and love
